sentences.english: The trees, like the longings of the earth, stand on tiptoe to peep at the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 树木就像要表达大地的愿望似的，踮起脚来探望苍穹。

sentences.english: High above, in the soft blue, a lone star still sparkles.
sentences.chinese: 苍穹之上，柔蓝之中，一颗孤星仍在闪烁。

sentences.english: I want to be free, and fly so high, so I can finally touch the sky.
sentences.chinese: 要自由的飞呀飞，飞得老高，直到触摸那广大苍穹。

sentences.english: Your eyes were kindled in the upper skies.
sentences.chinese: 你的双眸被点燃在苍穹之上。

sentences.english: The firmaments of stars embosomed in His Creation.
sentences.chinese: 星之苍穹围绕在他创造的物中。

sentences.english: On day two, the firmament is established.
And we can network between domes and classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 我们能够把苍穹和教室连接起来。

sentences.english: But the whole world, still to listen, and God in His heaven smiles.
sentences.chinese: 但是整个世界都在谛听，上帝也在苍穹中露出了微笑。

sentences.english: The heavens bleed, through open wounds, the dim light of the Moon.
sentences.chinese: 苍穹泣血，她痛苦的伤口，正是月亮那昏沉的光亮。

sentences.english: Copies of the edict were inscribed on stone monuments all over the empire.
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国到处可见苍穹有力地刻有该法令的石碑。

sentences.english: And today, when I watch the tiny buds on the hanging in the sky shame shame.
sentences.chinese: 而今日，当我看那小小的月芽羞羞的悬在苍穹。

sentences.english: The stars in their firmament behave like stars.
sentences.chinese: 苍穹的那些星啊还是它们的老模样。

sentences.english: I found myself standing at the top of the sky, which was as clear as crystal.
sentences.chinese: 我恍如置身于水晶般清澈的苍穹之上。

sentences.english: The long crow of rooster split the gray morning sky.
sentences.chinese: 一只雄鸡引吮长鸣，惊破了黎明时的苍穹。

sentences.english: The faint band of light that stretches across the sky is the disc of our spiral galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 一条模糊的光带穿越苍穹，这是我们旋涡星系的盘面。

definition: (literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
the sky/the firmament/the vault of heaven
the Ninth Heaven/the highest of the heavens
